name: Go home, you're drunk!
description:
Created by ETeeski (code), DanielSND (Art), and PXLDJ (Music & Sound) in 15 hours! (including polish, it was more like 20 hours). We created this game in a self-proclaimed game jam for the purpose of promoting the Ultimate GameDev Tutorials Kickstarter. The theme of this game jam was chosen by the audience of the livestream, which was "Parkour".

The whole process was live-streamed and recorded and you can watch the art part of it here:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLNO3wz6h96CZ2tIML3nUXADP1vi-IJ8_q

Credits:

Code - ETeeski (click here)

Art - DanielSND (click here)

Music and Sounds - PXLDJ (click here)

Download the Source Unity Project Files: (MediaFire - click here)
